name: Wu Gang Cutting Pumpkin
description:
Wu Gang Cutting Pumpkin is a simple game and the final product of around 15 hours of lone work. The project was made for Mini Jam 89 as a learning experience.

The game's idea comes from the Chinese legend of Wu Gang (吳剛伐桂) but instead of cutting a tree and being a human, Wu Gang is an astral being that travels the moon's whereabouts and uses its speed to cut through pumpkins. Doesn't sound too fun, right?

The game contains two game modes: an endless singleplayer and a local 2-player multiplayer. It's stylized a bit like retro games but with a few modern touches.

Well, that's it.
